title: Hanging With Friends v4.56 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009	
		

If you appreciate my work you can leave a commnent and seed this for as long you can to help me upload more.

Requirements: Android 2.1 and up
Overview: Hanging With Friends is a twist on hangman from the makers of Words With Friends


The popular word game Hanging With Friends is now on Android! It's your next game addiction from the creative geniuses behind Words With Friends!

Hanging With Friends brings a brand new twist to the classic game of hangman that adds creativity, strategy and fun for all ages. Build mystery words to stump, amuse or impress your friends, but be prepared to flex those brain muscles as you decipher the words they send back to you.
